original_title: Nilfer Ibrahim assaulted after St. Joseph’s – Kingswood match
original_body_lines: Nilfer Ibrahim, St. Joseph’s College Rugby Head  Coach was assaulted by a spectator soon after their match against Kingswood College at Pallekele yesterday.
Hosts Kingswood College issuing a statement confirmed the matter is under preliminary investigation.

“We wish to inform you that the incident involving a parent and our esteemed Old Boy, Nilfer Ibrahim, is currently under investigation by the Kingswood Rugby Union and the school officials. It is essential to maintain the integrity of this process. Please be advised that the Kingswood Rugby Union will issue an official notice regarding this matter in due course. Your understanding and cooperation in this sensitive situation are greatly appreciated” the statement read.

Nilfer Ibrahim speaking to the ‘Daily Mirror” commenting on the incident said “I am warded at the Peradeniya General Hospital and am undergoing treatment, I have an injury on my knee.  I was assaulted by a spectator after the match”.  (Shamseer Jaleel)
